The existence of a bombastic commercial: a 22-inch stuffed animal with a resemblance to the 45th President of the United States.
Confirmation from Exceptional Products: the Texas company that markets Trumpy Bear, that the commercial is real and not a spoof.
The availability of Trumpy Bear for purc: with details provided about its features, including a zipped pouch to store a 28-by-30-inch American flag blanket.
Ownership of the trademark on Trumpy Bea: as confirmed by U.S. Patent and Trademark Office records.
